property.title: expected realization outcome end of period column
Row Dimension holding unique key for clicking through
number of ticks in the graph
realization higher than target is better
Measure to Colour (Blank will take whatever is in first column)
Measure to use as Bubble (Blank hide bubble)
Top X, Bottom X or Both
Technical proprty for Selected External String Full
Internal Event for On Selection Changed

component.title: Facet Filter 2.0
component.tooltip: FacetFilter - A simple selector which is using the facet techniques

component.title: Facet Selector 2.0
component.tooltip: FacetSelector - A simple selector which is using the facet techniques

property.title: X-Axis Measure (Blank will take whatever is in first column)
Y-Axis Measure (Blank will take whatever is in second column)
JSON Object that contains the metadata that is assigned with the Datasource
useDummyData - Use Dummy Data when no DataSource
showText - Should the text of the single bubbles be shown.
showRootBubble - Defines if the default first bubble should get shown
alerterUsePercentage - Should percentages be used or real values
alerterHighValuesAreGood - High values use color green and low values red if set to true
dimHierarchy - Which dimension contains the hierarchy
kfBubbleSize - Which keyfigure should get used for size of bubbles
selectedNode - Returns an JSON Object of the selected node
kfColBub - Which keyfigure should get used for the alerter of bubbles
whichTextShown - possible values are value, value_text, text_value, text
BubbleSizeMaxSize - What size in pixels should the startpoint have
BubbleRootXTranslation - What translation should the root have from the default position. positive means right, negative means left translation
BubbleSizeBoderSize - What size should the border of a bubble have. Possible values are 1 to 15
AlerterColorGreenVal - What percentage or real value should good values have - value has to be higher than Yellow
AlerterColorYellowVal - What percentage or real value should medium values have - all lower values are red
Measure to use for Marker Size
Top X, Bottom X or Both
Central Data Provisioning
property.tooltip: Provision Data Centrally for Component Access

property.title: Information Event Active
property.tooltip: Send Data Information Event when data is available

property.title: Internal Property to Trigger the reload
Geometry of the Master Result Set
Slave Central Data Provisioner
property.tooltip: Result Set with Slave Data for Selection

property.title: Column Index for the Selection from Slave Result Set
property.tooltip: Which column should be selected from the slave result set

property.title: Collect Multiple Matches
property.tooltip: Procedure what should happen when multiple matches are available

property.title: Content Condition to Read Slave Result Set
property.tooltip: Under which condition should be the slave result set read (based on content or value)

property.title: Row Condition to Read Slave Result Set
property.tooltip: Under which condition should be the slave result set read (based on contnet of header row key)

property.title: Column Condition to Read Slave Result Set
property.tooltip: Under which condition should be the slave result set read (based on contnet of header column key)

property.title: X-Axis Measure (Blank will take whatever is in first column)
Y-Axis Measure (Blank will take whatever is in second column)
Top X, Bottom X or Both
Complete Data Source Result Set
property.tooltip: Holds a reference to a result set

property.title: Tag Cloud Dimension
property.tooltip: Dimension containing text tokens for tag cloud

property.title: Tag Rotation
property.tooltip: Set the rotation of text tags over 5 characters in length

property.title: Tag Font
property.tooltip: Set the font of text tags

property.title: Tag Size
property.tooltip: Measure to specify size of tags

property.title: Tag Color
property.tooltip: Measure to specify color of tags

property.tooltip: Returns a JSON object of the selected node
